Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "Alpha lunges at Watanabe. Watanabe crosses his daggers to block Alpha's perforating thrusts."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What are you people scheming again?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Well. Just a mere hunt.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'A hunt?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Quite. You people were just a few uninvited guests.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sensing Alpha laxing from speech, Watanabe rotates his dagger and redirects her blade to the ground. Stepping on the false edge of her blade, Watanabe hops airborne.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Oh. My apologies then.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe somersaults midair. Using the downward pull of gravity, he launches a wind-tearing cut at Alpha.'}
{3: 'Alpha, on the ground, leisurely raises her blade behind her head, taking on an inviting stance.'}

{3: 'The blades clash. Sparks flash. The two find themselves locked in a bind, but none of them could maneuver their weapons into functional offense. They push off each other to put distance between themselves.'}
{3: "A dagger scratch finds itself planted on Alpha's arm. Red vital fluid seep out from the gash."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "What's the matter? Out of breath?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Well... You lot aren't our target this time. Though you did cause some trouble for me... You sure you want more?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Why don't we... make a deal?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Alpha points her blade at the Forsaken who have fallen to the ground around her.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'We call it here, and your companions might make it if you patch them up in time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken', 3: 'Hah... Nice try...!'}
{3: 'One of the Forsaken on the ground fires his gun shakily at Alpha, but before the bullet could reach her, Alpha casually deflects it with her blade.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Clark, take our wounded to the medics.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Wise decision.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Goodbye it is, then. I still have to make sure our prey is arriving at the right spot.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What did that man do?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha puts away her Katana and walks toward her motorcycle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: '...He chased after a false truth.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under the wary gazes of the Forsaken, Alpha rides on her motorcycle and turns to face Watanabe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmph. It won't just be a scratch the next time you step into Forsaken territory.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Heh. I can hardly wait.', 4: '1'}
